availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Horatio V. Hobbs (Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. Maryland native. Married to E. Hobbs. Father of W. Hobbs, V. Hobbs, J. Hobbs, Joseph Hobbs, S. E. Hobbs, E. Hobbs, L. Hobbs, S. Hobbs, and C. Hobbs. Farmer in Ballard County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, p. 502.
Find A Grave, "Horatio Vincent Hobbs, Sr (1811-January 12, 1892)," Memorial #6945844, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/6945844 (accessed July 24, 2018).
